Mancheng county in Baoding 保定[Bao3 ding4], Hebei

pinyin: Man3 cheng2 jin4 dai4 huang2 jin1 jia3

sentences.english: The stirring event was well canvassed.
sentences.chinese: 那桩惊人的事情已经是满城风雨。

sentences.english: Curse of the Golden Flower takes place mostly within the confines of the palace itself.
sentences.chinese: 《满城尽带黄金甲》大部分故事发生在宫廷里面。

sentences.english: Mancheng County's investment policy preferences, relaxed environment.
sentences.chinese: 满城县的招商引资政策优惠，环境宽松。

sentences.english: Specifically see the injustice all the way, good to play the powerful Han, as the city is people are afraid of him Jiangzhou.
sentences.chinese: 专一路见不平，好打强汉，以此江州满城人都怕他。

sentences.english: There have been too much publicity about their relationship.
sentences.chinese: 他们的关系已经闹得满城风雨，人人皆知了。

sentences.english: "The Curse of the Golden Flower" directed by Zhang Yimou is attractive in sound and picture.
sentences.chinese: 张艺谋的《满城尽带黄金甲》音画都十分吸引人。

sentences.english: From the end of Qing dynasty to Minguo, Miyun Manchu City was gradually ruined.
sentences.chinese: 从清末至民国时期，密云“满城”逐渐走向了消亡。

sentences.english: He borrowed a bike and pedaled all round the town.
sentences.chinese: 他借了辆自行车，骑着满城转。

sentences.english: Eric: Must be a lot of rumors why you're back.
sentences.chinese: 你一回来肯定满城风雨了吧。

sentences.english: Jack: I'm going to catch Curse of the Golden Flower this weekend.
sentences.chinese: 这个周末我准备去看《满城尽带黄金甲》。

sentences.english: There had been too much publicity about their relationship.
sentences.chinese: 他们的关系已经闹得满城风雨，人人皆知了。

sentences.english: The film star's engagement with the mayor became the talk of the town.
sentences.chinese: 那个电影明星和市长订婚弄得满城风雨的。

sentences.english: The circus placarded the city with advertisements.
The whole town was alive with talk about revolutionaries who were flooding the mills with their handbills.
sentences.chinese: 传说革命者涌进工厂里散发传单，这事弄得满城风雨。

sentences.english: She chased all over town looking for a dress in her size.
sentences.chinese: 她为寻找尺寸合身的衣服而满城奔跑。

sentences.english: Is still the cause uproar, it permeates in whatever you set foot in the soil.
sentences.chinese: 依旧是满城风雨，它弥漫在任何你涉足的土壤。
